description: This course is designed for any men that want a comprehensive, proven system for meeting tons of women easily on Tinder and similar dating apps and sites. It's presented in video format where I cover everything you need to know step by step, as each lecture builds upon the previous one. Also, included is a free 126 page ebook: How to Meet Women Online, which has word-for-word scripts and screenshot examples of conversations to get her phone number, and how to text and set up dates. The material and system in this course is exactly what my company Pro Dating Assistant uses to get our clients amazing results! Looking forward to seeing you on the inside!
title: Tinder Guide for Guys: A Proven System for Meeting Women
